001package io.github.ai4ci.config.setup;
002
003import java.io.Serializable;
004
005import org.immutables.value.Value;
006
007import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnore;
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonSubTypes;
009import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonSubTypes.Type;
010import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonTypeInfo;
011import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonTypeInfo.Id;
012import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.OptBoolean;
013
014import io.github.ai4ci.abm.ModifiablePerson;
015import io.github.ai4ci.abm.Outbreak;
016import io.github.ai4ci.abm.Person;
017import io.github.ai4ci.functions.EmpiricalDistribution;
018import io.github.ai4ci.util.ExoticDistributions;
019import io.github.ai4ci.util.Sampler;
020
021/**
022 * Supertype of demographic configuration strategies.
023 *
024 * <p>
025 * This interface declares the methods required by model builders to construct
026 * persons and to compute relationship strengths between agents. Concrete
027 * subtypes provide different levels of demographic detail such as unstratified,
028 * age stratified or location aware demographies.
029 *
030 * <p>
031 * Downstream consumers include the setup stage in
032 * {@link io.github.ai4ci.flow.builders.DefaultModelBuilder} (which creates
033 * person stubs and places agents) and the person baseliner which reads
034 * demographic attributes when building perâ€‘person baselines.
035 *
036 * <p>
037 * Extension guidance: add new demographic styles by introducing a new subtype
038 * and registering it in the Jackson polymorphic mapping. Keep the public
039 * contract stable: builders rely on {@link #createPersonStub} and
040 * {@link #getRelationshipStrength}.
041 * </p>
042 *
043 * @author Rob Challen
044 */
045@JsonTypeInfo(
046                use = Id.NAME,
047                requireTypeIdForSubtypes = OptBoolean.TRUE
048)
049@JsonSubTypes(
050        { @Type(
051                        value = ImmutableUnstratifiedDemography.class,
052                        name = "unstratified"
053        ), @Type(value = ImmutableAgeStratifiedDemography.class,
054                        name = "age-stratified"
055        ), @Type(value = ImmutableLocationAwareDemography.class,
056                        name = "location-aware"
057        ) }
058)
059public interface DemographicConfiguration extends Serializable {
060
061        /**
062         * Create a modifiable person stub attached to the supplied outbreak.
063         *
064         * @param outbreak owning outbreak used to attach the created person
065         * @return a modifiable person stub
066         */
067        ModifiablePerson createPersonStub(Outbreak outbreak);
068
069        /**
070         * Used internally to get the quantile of distance between 2 people in the
071         * network.
072         *
073         * @return a distribution of distances between random points in the space
074         *
075         */
076        @JsonIgnore @Value.Lazy
077        default EmpiricalDistribution getEuclidianDistanceCDF() {
078                return ExoticDistributions.getEuclidianDistanceDistribution();
079        }
080
081        /**
082         * A distance measure from 0 (distant) to 1 (identity) based on the quantile
083         * of the euclidian distance in this persons position versus the distribution
084         * of distances between location of random points in the space.
085         *
086         * @param one first person
087         * @param two second person
088         * @return proximity measure between 0 and 1
089         */
090        default double getProximity(Person one, Person two) {
091                var dist = Math.sqrt(
092                                Math.pow(
093                                                one.getDemographic().getLocationX()
094                                                                - two.getDemographic().getLocationX(),
095                                                2
096                                ) + Math.pow(one.getDemographic().getLocationY() - two.getDemographic().getLocationY(), 2)
097                ) / Math.sqrt(2.0);
098                return 1 - this.getEuclidianDistanceCDF().getCumulative(dist);
099        }
100
101        /**
102         * Compute a relationship strength between two people used as an odds
103         * modifier when composing contact probabilities.
104         *
105         * @param source  the source person
106         * @param target  the target person
107         * @param sampler a random sampler for stochastic choices
108         * @return a numeric relationship strength
109         */
110        double getRelationshipStrength(
111                        Person source, Person target, Sampler sampler
112        );
113}
